short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the popup which is shown when MasterClass video is paused

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you are using the browser to watch MasterClass classes you want to pause it and check some graphs/charts. But there is a popup that covers the paused video.

This extension hides that popup, so you can fully see the paused video frame.
